How groome helps hiring

Maximise lead to conversion ratio

Uncover insights, know your priority

Prioritize on quality leads, pursue what matters and focus on opportunities which get converted instantly.

Track and follow-up on every deal

Stay up to date on all your leads. Identify leads that need your attention, know where they are at and what's next for them.

Set, manage and achieve your targets

Measure your company’s talent deficit gap, set realistic targets and close winning deals to bring perfect balance.

Collaborate in real time

Manage workflows, have relevant conversations

View multiple opportunities for a single lead. Manage each of them across their stages from discovery to win.

Schedule meetings, get smarter in your follow up

Meet clients on the go. Document your conversations to drive relevant engagements with them and push your leads to a winning closure.

Team up on tasks to set up streamlined ‘events’

Collaborate on tasks and deliver successful customer demos. Never lose an opportunity and make every conversation count.

Run customer centric business

Gain intelligence on your customer sentiments

Sense your customer’s pulse. Understand which opportunities will come through and build your sales pipeline.

Cherry pick leads, make deals

Pick leads which are ready to be cracked and keep an eye on those stale leads before they are lost.

Capture your customer needs in a single view

Track multiple opportunities for single lead. Have information available at your finger tips on your what the customer needs.

Talent workbench

Paperless onboarding

Grooms captures candidate details right from the start. Discover the social footprint and enable single point documentation of your prospective hire to simplify their on-boarding process.

Employee data governance

Avoid data loss and information overlap. Establish robust processes across your organization and ensure data integrity in managing employee information.

Project resource mapping

Capacity planning should not be detrimental for your project sucess. Ensure high availability of talent pool, for all your projects that are in pipeline to maximize your customer wins.

Talent supply chain

Shared economy on talent pool

Engage with your vendor effectively. Get access to a shared pool of talents. Handle requirements with ease and deliver consistently.

Reduce cost & time to hire

Increase your response time on requirement by mining your existing database, identifying prospective candidates for future roles and keeping them warm.

Meet your hiring targets

Meet your hiring target by creating talent reserve to cover future hiring opportunities and ensuring you never start a search from scratch.

Talent pool management

Project planning & Resource utilization

Groome helps you manage cost centers and projects. Track project cost and burn on resource utilization and drive each project to a profitable closure.

visibility to resource pipeline

Groome gives you complete visibility on your talent pool. Have a birds eye view on the talent distribution across your bench, ATS and vendors with cost drivers.

leverage talent mining

Groome regularly keeps applicant profiles up to date with their professional information and recommends candidature for open job positions.

Accelerated sourcing

Single system of reference

Consolidate all your the candidate information under one roof to easily share, create interview schedules, update tasks, follow ups and collaborate on multiple requirements.

Talent replenishment

Stay abreast of the latest trends in the market. Groome helps you screen for the most recent skillset and replenish your database with the the best talent.

Search smart, rank & share

Groome scans the talent pool to rank and publish ready to fit candidate profiles which, you can share instantly.

Intelligent recruiting

Automated workflows

Automate manual processes like recurrent tasks and workflows to save time and see to it that nothing misses from your view.

Free up your team from mundane

Schedule quick interview cycles, manage multi team requirements, generate fast candidate feedback and stay ahead in your communication. Groome helps you beat the mundane.

Take data driven decisions

Groome combines data from multiple sources including social media, Job portals and emails make sure you take a data driven approach in handling your candidate relationships.

AI powered sourcing

Find the best talents, faster

Reduce your turn around time for any positions to fill by half. Share candidate profiles from multiple system of records to close you open positions.

Predict your next hire

Build diversified candidate pipeline that focus on your open and upcoming roles with a system which is ubiquitous and always up to date.

Increase your pipeline with high quality candidates

Optimize your talent pipeline with insights into pipeline health. Groome Identifies and ranks high performing vendors who give you the best quality candidates.
